name: Front to Back Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example Question: Short for demonstration - Fashion
Answer : Demo mode (move the first two letters of demo to the end of the word to make mode).
Your turn now ...


Part of the face - Unit of measurement
Criminal act of starting a fire - System for detecting objects underwater
A place to keep a horse - Most competent
The shape formed by two lines meeting at a point (usually measured in degrees) - Deduce bit by bit
Firmly establish a belief or attitude in a person - Drizzling (weather)
A device for catching animals - Completely fascinated
To repeat something fresh - Decrease in strength or size
